name: Cloudy Weathery Pattern
description:
You can only control 1 "Cloudy Weathery Pattern". "Weathery" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, gain this effect.
â— (Quick Effect, except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; this turn, its ATK becomes half its current ATK, also it can attack directly.
